Modifications.Value: Allows the Hero to become invisible, and move faster for a set amount of time. When the Hero attacks a unit to break invisibility, he will deal bonus damage. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - <TPY1,DataB1,%>% move, <TPY1,DataC1> bonus damage, <TPY1,Dur1> seconds. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - <TPY1,DataB2,%>% move, <TPY1,DataC2> bonus damage, <TPY1,Dur2> seconds. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - <TPY1,DataB3,%>% move, <TPY1,DataC3> bonus damage, <TPY1,Dur3> seconds.|n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - <TPY1,DataB4,%>% move, <TPY1,DataC4> bonus damage, <TPY1,Dur4> seconds.
Allows the Hero to become invisible, and move <TPY1,DataB1,%>% faster for <TPY1,Dur1> seconds. If the Hero attacks a unit to break invisibility, the attack will do <TPY1,DataC1> bonus damage.
